content: chain *everything in brackets is crocheted into the chain space we will now repeat this process on the other side turn your work so that you are working down the opposite side of the monstera leaf down the base chain of single_crochet from the bottom/wide end to the tip of the leaf row 8 slip_stitch along the base chain until you reach the tip 24 slip_stitch row 9-14 repeat row 2-7 on the opposite side of the leaf fasten_off weave in all ends you now have a monstera leaf
